quran-desc: By the core developers of Quran.com, comes the beautiful and ad-free mushaf iOS and Android apps. Itâ€™s now easier to read the Quran on the go, memorize it, and listen to your favorite reciters.
tarteel-desc: By the co-developers of Quran.com website, Tarteel uses artificial intelligence to listen to your Quran recitation, and highlight mistakes. The app is designed for anyone who wants to increase their engagement with the Quran, featuring memorization mode, streaks, challenges, and more.
